Name: Wave Jumper
About the game: Wave Jumper is a 80's Synthwave platformer aimed at keeping momentum high and decisions quick. Use Bounce pads to preserve momentum and portals to switch momentum quickly. Beware the Synthspikes, Synthbeams, and Synthdiamonds. If you get tired you can always try out the pong by inputting the super secret code on the bottom of the settings screen at the main menu, but you have to do it in the level select to get it work.
Meta Title: Wave Jumper: Dec 21, 2021, Bewx and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Wave Jumper? Check out the release date (Dec 21, 2021), developer insights from Bewx, and a complete game summary.
